        <td id="LC7330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The President in particular is very much a figurehead - he wields</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7331"></td>
        <td id="LC7331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no  real  power  whatsoever.  He  is  apparently  chosen  by  the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7332"></td>
        <td id="LC7332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government, but the qualities he is required to display  are  not</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC7333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those  of leadership but those of finely judged outrage. For this</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7337"></td>
        <td id="LC7337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Zaphod  Beeblebrox  is  one of the most successful Presidents the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7338"></td>
